participant_1.background:
I don't feel fulfilled in my life and need to express myself more.
I love my laptop because it keeps me connected to the world when I'm on the go.
i am a night owl.
My life is filled with contradictions, and I'm working on accepting myself for who I am.
I love to dress up but it's not all about the look, I like to keep my feet on the ground.

participant_2.background:
I start my day with coffee and a quick practice session before heading off to city council meetings.
I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life.
I think it is really cool to use my art to communicate with people.
I'm not as happy as I look, but my parents think I have everything I could ever want.
I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to.

content.text: Not much! Just got back from a city council meeting.
Oh, cool. Were you the one who spoke about the new development project?
No, I'm not on the council yet. I'm just an artist that lives in the city.
Oh, cool. What kind of art do you do?
I'm a painter and a musician.
That's awesome. I love art. I'm not very good at it, but I love to see it.
Well, thank you! I'm glad you appreciate it.
So, what kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and sing.
Oh, that's awesome! We should jam sometime.
Yeah, that would be fun. I'll bring my drum set over.
Great! I'll text you later and we can figure out a time to practice.
